page.title: 05Warren Hills School
page.content: Now I am 11 I am leaving{Warren Hills {School.}What I have enjoyed most is science and using the computer for project work.I have been on lots of trips with the School but my favourite was our week in London. Things I will always remember about Warren Hills are starting (I was very frightened but soon made friends), class assemblies,swimming,school sports and the discos. I don't always like playtime because it is often cold but outside we play marbles,kiss-chase,British Bulldog, tig,football and other ball games. One thing I won't miss are the School dinners;although there is a choice of meal I prefer to bring sandwiches. It is strange to think that when I started School I couldn't read or write yet now I'm ready to go to the High School.
